creator: Quantum Method | The Science of Living
descriptionHtml:
Get closer to Allah everyday, with the Best free Al Quran app for your smartphone with Bangla translation.The ‘Al Quran Bangla Mormobani’ is the unique app with the easiest form of Bangla translation for you to read and feel the divine blessings of The Almighty in your everyday life.
Whether you are stuck in a traffic jam, finished your Fajr prayer or before going to bed, immerse yourself into ‘The Manual Of Life’ in mother tongue.

The ‘Al Quran Bangla Mormobani’ is designed in a way that anyone of any age and who can read Bangla can understand the Essence of The Holy Quran in his/her mother tongue with ease and grace. Or if one wishes, one can recite it in both Arbi/Arabic and Bangla simultaneously, or can choose to recite in Arabic only. The Holy Quran is the sacred book for all of mankind and anyone from any religion, nation, gender, cast or creed reserves all the right to access the teachings of Holy Quran and implement it in his/her life.

Install this app today and get ahead in life on earth and life after death. Read, recite in Arabic, edit with our editing tools and many more! Share it with your friends and family and help them come closer to the teachings of Merciful Allah. May your life become more peaceful and success comes around regularly.

The ‘Al Quran Bangla Mormobani app brings you the most modern features you can imagine. We describe them below:

Free Offline Quran:
Read the Holy Quran in three different ways, according to your wish:
1. Read the Ayats only in Bangla language
2. Recite the Ayats only in Arabic language
3. Read Arabic Ayats and Bangla Ayats one after another

Listen to The Quran audio in mp3:
Our app is designed in a way that lets you listen to mp3, or audio version of each Ayat in three different ways as well according to your choice:
1. Listen to The Quranic verses only in Bangla language
2. Listen to The Quranic verses only in English language
3. Listen to The Quranic verses in Arabic and bangla one after another

Notification of Quranic Ayats :
Enjoy our wonderful gift of notification of an Ayat everyday. You may set notification remider as many times as you want. Read a new Ayat everytime by clicking on the ‘Al Quran Mormobani’ notification on your smartphone.

Favourite Option:
Mark the certain Quranic verse that has striked your mind. You may find them all in one place to review them again whenever you feel like.

Download Facility of Al Quran Free:
Download entire Quran mp3 completely free of cost.

Personal Notes:
Take as many personal notes as you like for each Ayat individually. Edit them with our font editors for a more personalised effect on your note.

Al Quran Widget:
Add the Al Quran widget to your homescreen to find a new Quranic Ayat on your smartphone’s screen after every few minutes.

Share and Enjoy The Holy Quran Togther:
Use our ‘Share’ option to connect with friends and family and share with them the Wonderful verses of The Holy Quran in Bangla or in Arabic language, as you like
so their lives may be enlightened by the knwoledge of the Holy book as well.


Our Suggestions regarding the app Usage:

1. Read the Quran Daily.
2. Try to understand the messages in every line,in every word of the Holy Book.
3. The more we know what is written in the Quran for mankind, the more we can change our lives positively. That is why it is important that we read the Quran in our mother tongue.
4. Keep in mind that the ‘Quran’ is meant for the whole of mankind. So everyone from any religion can learn from this Holy book.
5. You may often listen to the audio of Al quran too for different insight.

Visit site: http://alquran.org.bd
Maintained by: Quantum Method – The Science of Living (http://quantummethod.org.bd)

Email: webmaster@quantummethod.org.bd
descriptionShort: Read The Holy Quran in Bangla in its easiest and simplest form.

The ‘Al Quran Bangla Mormobani’ is designed in a way that anyone of any age and who can read Bangla can understand the Essence of The Holy Quran in his/her mother tongue with ease and grace. Or if one wishes, one can recite it in both Arbi/Arabic and Bangla simultaneously, or can choose to recite in Arabic only. The Holy Quran is the sacred book for all of mankind and anyone from any religion, nation, gender, cast or creed reserves all the right to access the teachings of Holy Quran and implement it in his/her life.

Install this app today and get ahead in life on earth and life after death. Read, recite in Arabic, edit with our editing tools and many more! Share it with your friends and family and help them come closer to the teachings of Merciful Allah. May your life become more peaceful and success comes around regularly.

The ‘Al Quran Bangla Mormobani app brings you the most modern features you can imagine. We describe them below:

Free Offline Quran:
Read the Holy Quran in three different ways, according to your wish:
1. Read the Ayats only in Bangla language
2. Recite the Ayats only in Arabic language
3. Read Arabic Ayats and Bangla Ayats one after another

Listen to The Quran audio in mp3:
Our app is designed in a way that lets you listen to mp3, or audio version of each Ayat in three different ways as well according to your choice:
1. Listen to The Quranic verses only in Bangla language
2. Listen to The Quranic verses only in English language
3. Listen to The Quranic verses in Arabic and bangla one after another

Notification of Quranic Ayats :
Enjoy our wonderful gift of notification of an Ayat everyday. You may set notification remider as many times as you want. Read a new Ayat everytime by clicking on the ‘Al Quran Mormobani’ notification on your smartphone.

Favourite Option:
Mark the certain Quranic verse that has striked your mind. You may find them all in one place to review them again whenever you feel like.

Download Facility of Al Quran Free:
Download entire Quran mp3 completely free of cost.

Personal Notes:
Take as many personal notes as you like for each Ayat individually. Edit them with our font editors for a more personalised effect on your note.

Al Quran Widget:
Add the Al Quran widget to your homescreen to find a new Quranic Ayat on your smartphone’s screen after every few minutes.

Share and Enjoy The Holy Quran Togther:
Use our ‘Share’ option to connect with friends and family and share with them the Wonderful verses of The Holy Quran in Bangla or in Arabic language, as you like
so their lives may be enlightened by the knwoledge of the Holy book as well.


Our Suggestions regarding the app Usage:

1. Read the Quran Daily.
2. Try to understand the messages in every line,in every word of the Holy Book.
3. The more we know what is written in the Quran for mankind, the more we can change our lives positively. That is why it is important that we read the Quran in our mother tongue.
4. Keep in mind that the ‘Quran’ is meant for the whole of mankind. So everyone from any religion can learn from this Holy book.
5. You may often listen to the audio of Al quran too for different insight.

Visit site: http://alquran.org.bd
Maintained by: Quantum Method – The Science of Living (http://quantummethod.org.bd)

Email: webmaster@quantummethod.org.bd
descriptionShort: Read The Holy Quran in Bangla in its easiest and simplest form.
